messages.subject: Question for everybody....
messages.msgSnippet: What interesting activites, projects or experiments have your kids done this past year? We ve gotten some really cool ideas from other unschoolers so tell us
messages.messageBody:
What interesting activites, projects or experiments have your kids done
this past year? We've gotten some really cool ideas from other
unschoolers so tell us what you've done in 2006!

This is the next topic for Unschooling Voices and all replies will be
added (unless you don't want yours to be included) to the next edition,
which will be out on December 1.

Thanks!

~ Joanne ~
Mom to Jacqueline (8), Shawna (11) & Cimion (14)
Adopted into our hearts October 2003
************************************
Unschooling Voices ~ Add Your Voice
www.foreverparents.com/UnschoolingVoices.html
